PROP.PROP_DESCRIPTION: WIA_DPC_PICTURES_TAKEN camera device property shall exist for a camera's root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_DPC_PICTURES_REMAINING camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPC_EXPOSURE_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the W IA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_NONE access.

WIA_DPC_EXPOSURE_COMP camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_RW access. Legal values are from -200 to 200 in increments of 50 Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_EXPOSURE_TIME camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW. Or WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_FNUMBER camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_NONE access.

WIA_DPC_FOCUS_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_ZOOM_POSITION camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_PAN_POSITION camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_IPC_THUMBNAIL camera item property shall exist for all image-type items on a camera device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_UI1/VT_VECTOR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_IPC_THUMB_WIDTH camera item property shall exist for all image-type items on a camera device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 ubtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_DPS_HORIZONTAL_BED_SIZE scanner device property shall exist for a flatbed scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_DPS_VERTICAL_BED_SIZE scanner device property shall exist for a flatbed scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

PROP.PROP_STRING_NAME: Scanner Device Horizontal Sheet Feed Size
PROP.PROP_DESCRIPTION: WIA_DPS_HORIZONTAL_SHEET_FEED_SIZE scanner device property shall exist for a sheet-fed or hand-held scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_IPC_THUMB_HEIGHT camera item property shall exist for all image-type items on a camera device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 ubtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPC_AUDIO_AVAILABLE camera item property is optional for all image-type items on a camera device. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPC_AUDIO_DATA_FORMAT common item property is optional for all image-type items on a camera device. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_CLSID subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPC_AUDIO_DATA common item property is optional for all image-type items on a camera device. This property shall exist for each item in the tree that has the WIA_IPC_AUDIO_AVAILABLE property set. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_UI1/VT_VECTOR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPC_SEQUENCE camera item property is optional for all image-type items on a camera device. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPC_TIMEDELAY camera item property is optional for all image-type items on a camera device. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

PROP.PROP_STRING_NAME: Camera Item Num Pict Per Row
PROP.PROP_DESCRIPTION: WIA_IPC_NUM_PICT_PER_ROW camera item property is optional for folder-type items on a camera device. If the property exists, it shall have the IA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPS_CUR_INTENT scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Valid flags for this property are: WIA_INTENT_NONE, WIA_INTENT_IMAGE_TYPE_COLOR, WIA_INTENT_IMAGE_TYPE_GRAYCALE, WIA_INTENT_IMAGE_TYPE_TEXT (image type flags); WIA_INTENT_MINIMIZE_SIZE, WIA_INTENT_MAXIMIZE_QUALITY (size/quality flags). The current property value should be an image type flag, possibly OR'ed with a size/quality flag.

WIA_IPS_XRES scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

WIA_IPS_YRES scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. If the device supports the independent setting of horizontal and vertical resolutions, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise, the property shall have the IA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPS_XPOS scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.For a sheet-fed scanner, it is allowed to have WIA_PROP_READ, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_NONE access.

WIA_IPS_YPOS scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.For a sheet-fed scanner, it is allowed to have WIA_PROP_READ, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_NONE access.

WIA_IPS_XEXTENT scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.For a sheet-fed scanner, it is allowed to have WIA_PROP_READ, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_NONE access.

WIA_IPS_YEXTENT scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

WIA_IPS_PHOTOMETRIC_INTERP scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. If the device supports selectable photometric interpretation, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise the property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. Valid values for this property are: WIA_PHOTO_WHITE_1 and WIA_PHOTO_WHITE_0.

WIA_IPS_BRIGHTNESS scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Legal values for this property are: WIA_BRIGHTNESS_AUTO, WIA_BRIGHTNESS_LIGHT, WIA_BRIGHTNESS_NORM, WIA_BRIGHTNESS_DARK or a value between -1000 and 1000.

WIA_IPS_CONTRAST scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Legal values for this property are: WIA_CONTRAST_AUTO or a value between -1000 and 1000.

WIA_IPS_ORIENTATION scanner item property is optional. This property applies to all image-type items on a scanner device. If a scanner can support the detection of document orientation, this property will be implemented. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. Valid values for this property are: PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE, ROT180 and ROT270.

WIA_IPS_ROTATION scanner item property is optional. This property applies to all image-type items on a scanner device. If a scanner supports internal rotation during scanning, this property will be implemented.If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Legal values for this property are: PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE, ROT180 and ROT270.

WIA_IPS_MIRROR scanner item property is optional. This property applies to all image-type items on a scanner device. If a scanner can support the detection of document mirroring, this property is implemented with WIA_PROP_READ access. If a scanner supports mirroring during scanning, this property is implemented with WIA_PROP_RW access. If the property exists, it shall have the VT_I4 subtype; the WIA_PROP_NONE type if the property is read only or WIA_PROP_LIST if the property is r/w. Legal values for this property are: WIA_MIRRORED.

WIA_IPS_THRESHOLD scanner item property shall exist for all image-type items on a scanner device. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

WIA_IPS_INVERT scanner item property is optional. This property applies to all image-type items on a scanner device. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

WIA_DPA_FIRMWARE_VERSION common device property shall exist for a device's root item for all device types. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. This string value shall have a length greater than zero.
This common device property is optional. Possible values for this property are: WIA_DEVICE_CONNECTED, WIA_DEVICE_NOT_CONNECTED.

WIA_DPA_DEVICE_TIME common device property is optional. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_UI2/VT_VECTOR subtype, WIA_PROP_READ or IA_PROP_RW access and shall contain a valid date stored in the format defined by the SYSTEMTIME structure. If the property has WIA_PROP_RW access, setting the property will update the time stored on the device.

WIA_IPA_ITEM_NAME common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. For the root item, the value of this property shall be "Root".

WIA_IPA_FULL_ITEM_NAME common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. For the root item, the value of this property shall be "\0001\Root", where 0001 is the same number as the number in the WIA_DIP_DEV_ID.

WIA_IPA_ITEM_FLAGS common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG or WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. The root item shall have only the flags WiaItemTypeDevice, WiaItemTypeRoot and WiaItemTypeFolder set.

WIA_IPA_ITEM_TIME common item property now becomes optional. If exists, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_UI2/VT_VECTOR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. Time is reported in the SYSTEMTIME format.

WIA_IPA_ACCESS_RIGHTS common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG type, the VT_I4 subtype, the WIA_PROP_READ access for scanners and the WIA_PROP_NONE(or WIA_PROP_FLAG) type, the VT_I4 subtype, the WIA_PROP_RW (WIA_PROP_READ) access for cameras. Legal values for this property are: WIA_ITEM_READ, WIA_ITEM_WRITE, WIA_ITEM_RD, WIA_ITEM_RWD or WIA_ITEM_CAN_BE_DELETED.

WIA_IPA_DATATYPE common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype, the WIA_PROP_READ access for cameras and the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype, the WIA_PROP_RW access for scanners. Legal values for this property are: WIA_DATA_THRESHOLD, WIA_DATA_DITHER, WIA_DATA_GRAYSCALE, WIA_DATA_COLOR, WIA_DATA_COLOR_THRESHOLD and WIA_DATA_COLOR_DITHER.

WIA_IPA_DEPTH common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the VT_I4 subtype. On devices that allow only a single color-space resolution per data type the property has READ access and WIA_PROP_NONE type, otherwise it has RW access and WIA_PROP_LIST type. For cameras, this property has always READ access and WIA_PROP_NONE type.

WIA_IPA_PREFERRED_FORMAT common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_CLSID subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. Legal values for this property are valid formats listed in WIA_IPA_FORMAT.

WIA_IPA_FORMAT common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_CLSID subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access for cameras and RW for scanners. For image items, When WIA_IPA_TYMED is set to TYMED_CALLBACK, the valid values for this property include at least WiaImgFmt_MEMORYBMP. When WIA_IPA_TYMED is set to TYMED_FILE, the valid values for this property include at least WiaImgFmt_BMP. For private formats, WIA_IPA_FILENAME_EXTENSION must be implemented to allow WIA applications to know the correct filename extension to use.Note: A file in video/audio format should not be marked as WiaItemTypeImage, and vice versa.

WIA_IPA_TYMED common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. The valid values for this property shall include TYMED_CALLBACK, TYMED_FILE, TYMED_MULTIPAGE_FILE and TYMED_MULTIPAGE_CALLBACK.
WIA_IPA_CHANNELS_PER_PIXEL common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPA_BITS_PER_CHANNEL common item property shall exist for all items.If the device supports the setting of the number of bits per channel, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_IPA_PLANAR common item property shall exist for all items. Possible values for this property are: WIA_PACKED_PIXEL and WIA_PLANAR.
WIA_IPA_PIXELS_PER_LINE common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_IPA_BYTES_PER_LINE common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_IPA_NUMBER_OF_LINES common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPA_GAMMA_CURVES common item property WIA_IPA_GAMMA_CURVES common item property is optional. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_IPA_ITEM_SIZE common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_IPA_MIN_BUFFER_SIZE common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
This common item property is OPTIONAL. Possible values for this property are: WIA_TEXT_ITEM, WIA_PHOTO_ITEM, WIA_DRAWING_ITEM, WIA_LOGO_ITEM, WIA_HANDWRITING_ITEM, WIA_CHART_ITEM, WIA_TABLE_ITEM
WIA_IPA_ICM_PROFILE_NAME common item property shall exist for all items. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_IPA_APP_COLOR_MAPPING common item property is optional. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_IPA_PROP_STREAM_COMPAT_ID common item property is optional. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_CLSID subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

WIA_IPA_FILENAME_EXTENSION common item property is mandatory for items with private formats and recommended for all other items. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_IPA_SUPPRESS_PROPERTY_PAGE common item property is optional. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE or WIA_PROP_FLAG type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPC_TILT_POSITION camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_TIMER_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Legal values are: WIA_TIMER_MODE_OFF and WIA_TIMER_MODE_ON. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_TIMER_VALUE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_POWER_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. Possbile values are: WIA_POWER_MODE_LINE and WIA_POWER_MODE_BATTERY.

WIA_DPC_BATTERY_STATUS camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. Possible values are between 0 and 100.
WIA_DPC_FOCUS_MANUAL_DIST camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPC_PICT_WIDTH camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access, or it may have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, VT_I4 subtype,and WIA_PROP_RW access. The number of legal values shall be the same as those of WIA_DPC_PICT_HEIGHT.

WIA_DPC_PICT_HEIGHT camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access, or it may have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, VT_I4 subtype,and WIA_PROP_RW access. The number of legal values shall be the same as those of WIA_DPC_PICT_WIDTH.

WIA_DPC_THUMB_WIDTH camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access, or it may have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, VT_I4 subtype, and WIA_PROP_RW access. The number of legal values shall be the same as those of WIA_DPC_THUMB_HEIGHT.

WIA_DPC_THUMB_HEIGHT camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access, or it may have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, VT_I4 subtype, and WIA_PROP_RW access. The number of legal values shall be the same as those of WIA_DPC_THUMB_WIDTH.

WIA_DPC_COMPRESSION_SETTING camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_TIMELAPSE_INTERVAL camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_TIMELAPSE_NUMBER camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_BURST_INTERVAL camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW accessOtherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_BURST_NUMBER camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW accessOtherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_EFFECT_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW accessOtherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_DIGITAL_ZOOM camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW accessOtherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_SHARPNESS camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_CONTRAST camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the IA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_CAPTURE_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_CAPTURE_DELAY camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_EXPOSURE_INDEX camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_EXPOSURE_METERING_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_FOCUS_METERING_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_FOCUS_DISTANCE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_FOCAL_LENGTH camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_RGB_GAIN camera device property is optional for a camera's root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.

WIA_DPC_WHITE_BALANCE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST or WIA_PROP_RANGE type,the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.
WIA_DPC_UPLOAD_URL camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPC_ARTIST camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtypeand the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPC_COPYRIGHT_INFO camera device property is optional for a camera's root item If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

PROP.PROP_STRING_NAME: Scanner Device Vertical Sheet Feed Size
PROP.PROP_DESCRIPTION: WIA_DPS_VERTICAL_SHEET_FEED_SIZE scanner device property is optional for a sheet-fed or a hand-held scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_SHEET_FEEDER_REGISTRATION scanner device property is optional for a sheet-fed or a hand-held scanner root item. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_HORIZONTAL_BED_REGISTRATION scanner device property is optional for a flatbed scanner root item. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_VERTICAL_BED_REGISTRATION scanner device property is optional for a flatbed scanner root item. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_PAD_COLOR scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the RGBQUAD (VT_UI2 | VT_VECTOR) subtype. NOTE: If the device allows the pad color to be set, this property should have a WIA_PROP_RW access. For all others it shall be WIA_PROP_READ.

WIA_DPS_DOCUMENT_HANDLING_CAPABILITIES scanner device property shall exist for a scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG or WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_DOCUMENT_HANDLING_STATUS scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG or WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_DOCUMENT_HANDLING_SELECT scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPS_DOCUMENT_HANDLING_CAPACITY scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_OPTICAL_YRES scanner device property might exist for a scanner root item. If exists, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. The property shall have a value greater than zero and less than 100,000.

WIA_DPS_PLATEN_COLOR scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the RGBQUAD(VT_UI2 | VT_VECTOR) subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_ENDORSER_CHARACTERS scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_DPS_ENDORSER_STRING scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_BSTR subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPS_SCAN_AHEAD_PAGES scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPS_MAX_SCAN_TIME scanner device property shall exist for a scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_PAGES scanner device property is optional for a flatbed scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.For scroll-fed scanners, this property is required.
WIA_DPS_PAGE_SIZE scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

WIA_DPS_TRANSPARENCY scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG or WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_DPS_TRANSPARENCY_SELECT scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_FLAG type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPS_PAGE_WIDTH scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPS_PAGE_HEIGHT scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_RANGE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.
WIA_DPS_PREVIEW scanner device property is optional for a scanner root item. If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.

PROP.PROP_STRING_NAME: Scanner Device Min Horizontal Sheet Feed Size
PROP.PROP_DESCRIPTION: WIA_DPS_MIN_HORIZONTAL_SHEET_FEED_SIZE scanner device property is optional for a sheet-fed or hand-held scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

PROP.PROP_STRING_NAME: Scanner Device Min Vertical Sheet Feed Size
PROP.PROP_DESCRIPTION: WIA_DPS_MIN_VERTICAL_SHEET_FEED_SIZE scanner device property is optional for a sheet-fed or a hand-held scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.
WIA_DPS_SHOW_PREVIEW_CONTROL scanner device property might exist for a scanner root item. If exists, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_IPA_COMPRESSION common item property shall exist for all items. If the device supports more than one compression type, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access.Otherwise, the property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. Legal values for this property are: WIA_COMPRESSION_NONE, WIA_COMPRESSION_BI_RLE4, WIA_COMPRESSION_BI_RLE8 and WIA_COMPRESSION_G3.
A device ID that is unique per physical device. This ID is composed of the Still Image class name followed by the device index. This ID is generated by the operating system.
The device manufacturer's name.
A description of the device.
An STI device type constant. Use the GET_STIDEVICE_TYPE macro to get the device type.
Name of the port through which the device is connected.
A user-readable device name.
The name of the server where the WIA server for this device is running.
The ID of the remote device
The class ID of the UI component.
The "hardwareConfig" entry in the driver's INF file.
The baud rate of serial devices.
The driver's "STI_USD_CAPS.dwGenericCaps" value. This value contains the driver's "DeviceType" and "DeviceSubType" values.
The version of WIA.
The DLL version number of the driver's USD file.

WIA_IPS_WARM_UP_TIME scanner item property is optional. This property applies to all image-type items on a scanner device. If the property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access.

WIA_DPS_OPTICAL_XRES scanner device property shall exist for a scanner root item. The property shall have the WIA_PROP_NONE type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_READ access. The property shall have a value greater than zero and less than 100,000.

WIA_DPC_FLASH_MODE camera device property is optional for a camera's root item.If this property exists, it shall have the WIA_PROP_LIST type, the VT_I4 subtype and the WIA_PROP_RW access. Legal values are WIA_FLASH_MODE_AUTO, WIA_FLASH_MODE_FILL, WIA_FLASH_MODE_OFF and WIA_FLASH_MODE_REDEYE. Otherwise it has WIA_PROP_READ, VT_I4 subtype and WIA_PROP_NONE.
